hook.text: Boomers value authority. Gen Z values authenticity. Know the gap.

buildup.text: Each generation was shaped by different events and technology.

discovery.text: Adapting language and examples to generational values increases impact.

twist.text: Don't patronize any generation. Respect their worldview.

climax.text: Generational awareness makes your message resonate more widely.

punchline.text: Know your generation's values. Adapt respectfully.

quiz.question: Why do generational values matter?
options: Each generation responds to different appeals
